title: Business & Finance
text:
The U.K. unveiled the country's biggest tax cuts since the early 1970s, a bold move aimed at kick-starting growth, but one that unnerved investors and sparked a selloff of the pound.

---

Ford has delayed deliveries of certain vehicles because it didn't have the blue oval badges that go on them, in another example of how supply-chain challenges have hit auto makers.

---

Netflix is changing how it compensates some of the comics it features, a move that could trim its costs and shift some financial burden and control of specials to the artists.

---

A federal judge ruled that U.S. Sugar can proceed with its planned purchase of rival Imperial Sugar , rejecting a Justice Department antitrust challenge to the deal.

---

Apple Music is set to be the new sponsor of the NFL 's Super Bowl halftime show, replacing PepsiCo .
